Course Overview

A practical guide to creating actionable sustainability strategies.

This workshop equips participants with the tools and frameworks to assess performance, set targets, create actionable roadmaps, and monitor sustainability outcomes within their organisations.

What You Need

Laptop for exercises, access to basic organisational data on energy, waste, and operations, and familiarity with sustainability concepts.

Key Takeaways

Participants will leave with a complete sustainability action plan, measurement frameworks, stakeholder engagement strategies, and practical tools to implement sustainability initiatives effectively.
